name: VIR-242.01 Verify that the following sub menu My Account menu has following options

testSteps.description: Given open the site and login

children.description: Enter the value in the field with label: anthony.lombardi@rustic-hw.com, Email Address
Enter the value in the field with label: 12341234, Password

testSteps.description: When click on "My Account" link in header

children.description: Click on link in header: My Account

testSteps.description:
Then My account menu has following items:
| Personal Details |
| Password |
| Email Address |
| Order History |
| Payment Details |
| Quotes Submitted For Review |
| Saved Carts |
| Sign Out |

exception.message:
[Missing some links. Expected: 8, Found: 9, 
Expected: Email Address, Found: Address Book, 
Expected: Order History, Found: Email Address, 
Expected: Password, Found: Order History, 
Expected: Payment Details, Found: Password, 
Expected: Personal Details, Found: Payment Details, 
Expected: Quotes Submitted For Review, Found: Personal Details, 
Expected: Saved Carts, Found: Quotes, 
Expected: Sign Out, Found: Replenishment Orders]

stackTrace.methodName: Then My account menu has following items:

children.description: Verify my account links: [Personal Details, Password, Email Address, Order History, Payment Details, Quotes Submitted For Review, Saved Carts, Sign Out]

userStory.narrative:
As a shopper, I require the ability to
hover over My Account in the header to view the Account Management
options available to me
